pageContext.claim: “Last year, ICE officers arrested nearly 4,000 illegal aliens charged or convicted of heinous crimes, including robbery, rape, and murder. Yet today's Democrat Party glorifies illegal immigration.”
pageContext.analysis: This is Trump's typical anti-immigrant spin. He is lumping in the small minority of ICE detainees who have committed serious crimes with the vast majority, who are criminals only in the sense that they broke immigration or traffic laws.
